r.d: The purpose of this driver is to provide exceptionally thin glue between MongoDB and PHP, implementing only fundemental and performance-critical components necessary to build a fully-functional MongoDB driver.
r.n:
** Bug * [PHPC-1005] - Ensure array symtable converts to object proptable in PHP 7.2 * [PHPC-1006] - Do not modify memory of Persistable::bsonSerialize() return value
** Task * [PHPC-997] - Update date/time handling code due to changes in timelib
